Package bio.singa.mathematics.graphs.model

Class Graphs

  • java.lang.Object
    • bio.singa.mathematics.graphs.model.Graphs
  • public class Graphs
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory class used to create graphs and convert other things to graphs.

      • buildLinearGraph

        public static UndirectedGraph buildLinearGraph​(int numberOfNodes)
        Generates a linear graph with the given number of nodes. Each node will be connected to its predecessor.
        Parameters:
        numberOfNodes - The number of nodes the graph should contain.
        Returns:
        A linear Graph

      • buildLinearGraph

                                               Rectangle boundingBox)
        Generates a linear graph with the given number of nodes. Each node will be connected to its predecessor.
        Parameters:
        numberOfNodes - The number of nodes the graph should contain.
        boundingBox - A bounding box where the nodes should be positioned.
        Returns:
        A linear Graph

      • buildCircularGraph

        public static UndirectedGraph buildCircularGraph​(int numberOfNodes)
        Generates a circular Graph with the given number of nodes. Each node will be connected to its predecessor and successor.
        Parameters:
        numberOfNodes - The number of nodes the circle should contain.
        Returns:
        A circular graph.

        boundingBox - A bounding box where the nodes should be positioned.
        Returns:

      • buildTreeGraph

        public static UndirectedGraph buildTreeGraph​(int depth)
        Generates a graph with a tree-like structure, where every node is connected to one predecessor and two successors, thus forming a fractal structure.
        Parameters:
        depth - The depth of the tree.
        Returns:
        A tree-like graph.

      • buildTreeGraph

        public static UndirectedGraph buildTreeGraph​(int depth,
                                             Rectangle boundingBox)
        Generates a graph with a tree-like structure, where every node is connected to one predecessor and two successors, thus forming a fractal structure.
        Parameters:
        depth - The depth of the tree.
        boundingBox - A bounding box where the nodes should be positioned.
        Returns:
        A tree-like graph.

      • buildRandomGraph

        public static UndirectedGraph buildRandomGraph​(int numberOfNodes,
                                               double edgeProbability)
        Generates a randomised graph based on the Erdös - Renyi model.
        Parameters:
        numberOfNodes - The number of nodes the graph should contain.
        edgeProbability - The probability, that two nodes will be connected.
        Returns:
        A randomized graph.

      • buildRandomGraph

        public static UndirectedGraph buildRandomGraph​(int numberOfNodes,
                                               double edgeProbability,
                                               Rectangle boundingBox)
        Generates a randomised graph based on the Erdös - Renyi model.
        Parameters:
        numberOfNodes - The number of nodes the graph should contain.
        edgeProbability - The probability, that two nodes will be connected (must be between 0.0 (no nodes are connected) and 1.0 (every node is connected))
        boundingBox - A bounding box where the nodes should be positioned.
        Returns:
        A randomized graph.

        rows - The Number of rows
        Returns:
        A rectangular grid graph.

        Parameters:
        boundingBox - Rectangle where the Graph is positioned.

        rows - The Number of rows
        Returns:
        A rectangular grid graph.

        public static <ContentType> GenericGraph<ContentType> convertTreeToGraph​(BinaryTree<ContentType> tree)
        Converts a BinaryTree to a GenericGraph.
        Type Parameters:
        ContentType - The content of the resulting generic graph.

        The generic graph.

      • findDisconnectedSubgraphs

        public static <NodeType extends Node<NodeType,​VectorType,​IdentifierType>,​EdgeType extends Edge<NodeType>,​VectorType extends Vector,​IdentifierType,​GraphType extends Graph<NodeType,​EdgeType,​IdentifierType>> java.util.List<GraphType> findDisconnectedSubgraphs​(GraphType graph)
        Given a graph, this method returns a list of all disconnected subgraphs. The subgraphs are copies and changes are not reflected back into the original graph, but node and edge identifiers, as well as attached data is conserved.
        Type Parameters:
        NodeType - The type of the nodes.
        EdgeType - The type of the edges.
        GraphType - The type of the graph.
        VectorType - The position type.
        IdentifierType - The type of the identifier.
        Parameters:
        graph - The graph to decompose.
        Returns:
        A list of all disconnected subgraphs.

      • modularProduct

        public static <NodeType extends Node<NodeType,​VectorType,​IdentifierType>,​EdgeType extends Edge<NodeType>,​VectorType extends Vector,​IdentifierType,​GraphType extends Graph<NodeType,​EdgeType,​IdentifierType>> GenericGraph<Pair<NodeType>> modularProduct​(GraphType graph1,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         GraphType graph2)
        Returns a modular product graph of the graphs G and G'.
        Parameters:
        graph1 - The first graph (G).
        graph2 - The second graph (G').
        Returns:
        A modular graph with nodes containing pairs of nodes u and u' from G and G'.

      • modularProduct

        public static <NodeType extends Node<NodeType,​VectorType,​IdentifierType>,​EdgeType extends Edge<NodeType>,​VectorType extends Vector,​IdentifierType,​GraphType extends Graph<NodeType,​EdgeType,​IdentifierType>> GenericGraph<Pair<NodeType>> modularProduct​(GraphType graph1,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         GraphType graph2,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         java.util.function.BiFunction<NodeType,​NodeType,​java.lang.Boolean> nodeCondition,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         java.util.function.BiFunction<EdgeType,​EdgeType,​java.lang.Boolean> edgeCondition)
        Returns a modular product graph of the graphs G and G'.
        Type Parameters:
        NodeType - The type of the nodes.
        EdgeType - The type of the edges.
        GraphType - The type of the graph.
        VectorType - The position type.
        IdentifierType - The type of the identifier.
        Parameters:
        graph1 - The first graph (G).
        graph2 - The second graph (G').
        nodeCondition - A bifunction that defines which nodes to be paired
        Returns:
        A modular graph with nodes containing pairs of nodes u and u' from G and G'.
